P

parser - Static variable in class at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.json.JSONDecoder
The parser that is required to parse the Strings to JSON-Objects.
phoneAcceptorPort - Variable in class at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.server.Server
The port, the PhoneConnectionAcceptor listens on for new connections.
PhoneConnection - Class in at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.server.connections
This class is used to communicate with a phone via a TCP-connection (see Connection class for more information on the basic functionalities).
It holds the reference to the CarConnection of a linked car (if any) in order to be able to forward information such as control-data to it.
PhoneConnection(Socket, LinkedBlockingQueue<QueueElement>) - Constructor for class at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.server.connections.PhoneConnection
Used to initialize this class with a Socket and a LinkedBlockingQueue for communicating with the main-thread.
PhoneConnectionAcceptor - Class in at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.server
A PhoneConnectionAcceptor listens for new Socket-connections on a specified port.
PhoneConnectionAcceptor(int, LinkedBlockingQueue<QueueElement>) - Constructor for class at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.server.PhoneConnectionAcceptor
 
phoneControl - Static variable in class at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.server.helper.Keywords
 
port - Variable in class at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.server.ConnectionAcceptor
The port that the ServerSocket tries to listen on, for new incoming Connections.
processCarInformation(List<String>) - Method in class at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.server.connections.CarConnection
Searches through a list of Strings and updates CarConnection.carInfo, if it contains certain keywords.
processConnectRequest(Object) - Method in class at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.server.connections.PhoneConnection
If the passed argument can be parsed to a long and is greater than 0, PhoneConnection.linkRequestId is set accordingly and the main-thread is informed about the request.
processQueueElement(QueueElement) - Method in class at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.server.Server
Takes a QueueElement and processes its Connection based on the EOperationType.
processRemainingData(HashMap<String, Object>) - Method in class at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.server.connections.PhoneConnection
Processes all parts of an incoming message that should be forwarded to the linked car, if any, and forwards them accordingly.
processSensorData(HashMap<String, Object>) - Method in class at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.server.connections.CarConnection
Processes all sensor-related data and puts it into the HashMap that is being forwarded to the linked phone.
properties - Static variable in class at.ac.tuwien.ict.andropicar.server.helper.Keywords
